topic.title: Deploying Content Fusion Enterprise on Ubuntu

keywords.indexterm: Installing an Enterprise server with Ubuntu

body.p: If you want to use other platforms other than VMware vSphere (for example, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure or Microsoft Hyper-V), you can use an installation kit that has been built to run on Ubuntu 18.04. This topic contains information for the server administrator about how to install and configure on Ubuntu.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p:
An Enterprise server solution requires the following prerequisites:
A fresh official Ubuntu 18.04 VM ()
Root access to the VM
4 GB of memory on the server
2 CPUs

section.title: Installing the Ubuntu Software
section.p:
To install on your Ubuntu 18.04 machine::
Go to the Download page.
Go to the Other Platforms tab and download the installation kit for Ubuntu.
Run the installer (the installation requires root privileges):sudo bash Oxygen_Content_Fusion_Enterprise.sh
Follow the on-screen instructions.
